feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Workflow/Report for Customers with Non-Valid SEPA Mandate
entry.content:
Hi SAP-Community,

we are looking for a way to handle the following situation:
An automatic billing run creates invoices for customers whose SEPA mandate exists in the system but is not yet valid (for example because it hasn’t been signed). This could result in delayed payments.

Ideally, we would like to have a report or workflow that flags these cases so that the responible person can follow up with the customer in time.

Has anyone set up such a solution or found a standard way in SAP to cover this?

Thanks in advance!

Katharina

entry.title: PR quantity in PO
entry.content:
Hello dear experts,

After i created PO for partial quantity from PR, i need an option to close that PR quantity completely. So when i again create a PO for that same PR the remaining open Quantity should appear as 0 or even that item shouldn't appear in PO this has to be achieved without changing the PR quantity.

entry.title: In S4HANA Public Cloud is there any standard report from Sales order to Invoice
entry.content: In S4HANA Public Cloud is there any standard report available where I can have data of the Sales Full cycle from Sales Order to Invoice with qty price and taxes?

entry.title: Sales BOM: Is PGI for Both Parent and Child Components Possible in S/4HANA Cloud?
entry.content:
Dear Experts,


During delivery of sales BOM, client wants to do PGI for both parent and child component. Is that possible?


But we are unable to do PGI for child components, only possible to do parent component. Which is also not correct.


Kindly provide solution ASAP.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: 在eclipse中使用ADT插件做RAP开发报表使用https调用odata接口遇到报错"Selection is empty. Processing is canceled!"
entry.content:
Dear SAP expert,

我们在eclipse中使用ADT插件做RAP开发报表时，数据没有合适的CDS，但是有对应的API：API_MRP_MATERIALS_SRV_01/SupplyDemandItems ，此API在使用postman测试时加上参数（?$filter=Material eq '******' and MRPPlant eq '****' and PeriodType eq '*'）就能得到想要的数据，在RAP代码中使用https调用odata接口会遇到报错：Selection is empty. Processing is canceled! ， 这是因为接口没有读取到我设置的参数，无论是使用set_form_field还是使用set_query都无法设置有效的参数，是否还有其他设置参数的方法，或者有https的其他类可以使用。

代码：

DATA: http_client TYPE REF TO if_web_http_client,

lo_response TYPE REF TO if_web_http_response,

lv_url type string,

lv_usename type string,

lv_pwd type string.

 

" 通过 URL 启用通信

DATA(lo_url_destination) = cl_http_destination_provider=>create_by_url(

lv_url ).

 

" 获取 请求的 client

http_client = cl_web_http_client_manager=>create_by_http_destination( lo_url_destination ).

 

DATA(req) = http_client->get_http_request( ).

 

"设置账号密码

req->set_authorization_basic( i_username = lv_usename i_password = lv_pwd ).

"设置参数

req->set_form_field( i_name = 'Material' i_value = '00698-321/0000' ).

req->set_form_field( i_name = 'MRPPlant' i_value = '8900' ).

req->set_form_field( i_name = 'PeriodType' i_value = '2' ).

req->set_header_field( i_name = 'Accept' i_value = 'application/json' ).

"执行查询方法

lo_response = http_client->execute( if_web_http_client=>get ).

"获取返回数据 （报错：Selection is empty. Processing is canceled!）

DATA(lv_random_value) = lo_response->get_text( ).

 

DATA lt_response TYPE ty_response.

 

/ui2/cl_json=>deserialize(

EXPORTING json = lv_random_value

CHANGING data = lt_response )

 

Best regards,

Joey

entry.title: Custom Fiori Application in 2SL System
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts,

We are currently working on the SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition (2-System Landscape – 2SL), and we are exploring the possibility of developing custom UI5Fiori applications.

Could you please guide us on the best practices or available approaches for developing and deploying custom UI5 Fiori applications to the S4HANA 2SL system

Thanks in Advance

Regards,

Sai Bhargav

entry.title: Not able to maintain Sourcelist is not usable for Inter company
entry.content:
Hello experts,

 

I am not able to maintain source list for intercompany when maintained it shows error message: M3351 we are able to use it before after the upgrade it shows this way .Kindly suggest how to rectify it .

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud : Setup Client ID/Secret, User ID and Password in Communication Arrangement
entry.content:
Hi Expert,

I am trying to implement the communication arrangement for a third-party REST API with their given user ID/password along with client ID and client secret. There is no as such IDP certificate from a third-party system that I can upload to Handshake with the SAP S/4HANA public cloud system. So I need to pass their user ID and password along with the client ID and secret. So my question is, where can I maintain these parameters, and how can I use it in SAP ABAP to establish the communication to call the REST API?

Note: When I do the same setup in Postman (with the user ID, password, client ID, and client secret), it generates the bearer token with one of the REST APIs, and I pass the generated bearer token to the second API call to send the data. I am trying to achieve similar functionality through communication arrangement and with ABAP code.

I highly appreciate the input and thank you in advance.

Regards,
Yasho.

entry.title: OpenText xECM connect with S/4Hana Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi Experts, SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition SAP Extended Enterprise Content Management by OpenText, cloud edition 

What are the options to connect OpenText xECM (Content Management 25.1) with S/4Hana Public Cloud? What is the best way to connect.

Regards,

Venky

entry.title: Request for Clarification on Proof of Delivery Functionality in cloud
entry.content:
Dear Support Team,

Could you please check and confirm whether SAP provides functionality to update the Proof of Delivery (POD) after the Tax Invoice has been created.

As per our business requirement, once the delivery is completed, the Tax Invoice is generated, and thereafter, the user records the Proof of Delivery in SAP.

Kindly provide us with the possible solution or approach for handling this scenario.

Thanks,

GM

entry.title: Outbound Delivery is not updating in EWM system it is stuck in queue for STO process
entry.content:
This is public cloud and we have only fiori app access.

We are creating the STO order from M300 plant (EWM managed) to W304 plant (IM managed). As soon as we create the OBD document, it is getting stuck in the queue with below error:

No business partner found for ERP partner 0000000000 (role:SP)

Message no. /SCWM/ERPINTEGRATION053

entry.title: DP_RS issue
entry.content:
Dear,

I have created (User ID:147) two PO's and approved one week back. Now i will update DP in payment processing tab manual downpayment 100% ,here one po No:125 will be triggered reset release strategy and one PO No.:126 did not triggered reset Release strategy.

Other user ID(User ID:258) update DP in payment processing tab manual downpayment 100% PO No.:125 did not triggered release strategy.

Why one user will be triggered reset release strategy, and one user did not trigger release strategy.

Thanks,

Brahmam.

entry.title: In class and characteristics how to maintain authorization groups in S4 Public cloud
entry.content:
In CL02 and CT04 there are fields, where we can maintain Authorizations, in ECC On premise these fields are free text but in  S4 Hana public cloud it has drop down. Can anyone how these values can be maintained.

Is there any customization path or any Fiori App where we need to maintain the details.

Refer Screenshots attached for better details

Any help will be appreciated

Class in ECC On Premise

Class in S4 Public Cloud

Characteristics in ECC On Premise

Characteristics in S4 Public Cloud

Thanks

entry.title: Production relevancy indicator is not editable in configuration in S4 HANA public cloud
entry.content:
In the BOM for production materials, there’s a setting called “Production-Relevant”.
Right now, it’s set to “Required” in the system config, so users can’t turn it off in the BOM screen.

In ECC (older SAP version), they could change this setting in OS20 spro config . But in S/4HANA public cloud, the field is grayed out, even though the change function is active. I need to make that optional.

Can someone please suggest

entry.title: No description found in any CDS view when a Code list created in custom field
entry.content:
Hello experts,

When we created a custom field of type code list and defined some code values and description,  it is working as expected but in the CDS view where its enabled we see only the code value and not the description, but the description field is  available in the API. Is this the expected behavious cant the description be accessed via any CDS views?

Thank you in advnace for your response.

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition  SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Research and Development

entry.title: PO return items cannot be set as mandatory in S/4 HANA Public cloud
entry.content:
Dear SAP expert,

In OP, we can define new field selection key and define screen layout to make return item as required field, but I cannot find the configuration in S/4 public cloud.

We also check this extension point, but return items field is not included. Is there any method to make the return items checked by default or mandatory per document type? Thanks!

Best regards,

Joey

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud Loans inbetween IC + interest rates on Loans
entry.content:
Hello everyone, we have the following questions about process mapping in the public cloud.

The company is migrating from NON SAP to SAP Public Cloud.

The company has subsidiaries abroad, and these subsidiaries receive loans from the parent company. How can this process be mapped in the public cloud? (The idea was to have a subledger and reconciliation accounts for both the lender and the borrower.)

Loans must be valued twice a year in accordance with IFRS.
Loans with contracts bear interest – how can the interest rate/interest period be mapped in SAP Public Cloud? (Through normal general ledger account postings)

entry.title: Missing Email Template
entry.content:
Hello,

I am working on Workflows for Purchase order, but missing the Notification tab. I have referred the Snote#3112088, but how to get MMPUR_CPR_DEFAULT_EMAIL_TMPL, as this template not available with my CBC system.

Thanks & Regards

Rahman

entry.title: I can't create a cost center.
entry.content:
Currently, I"m trying to create a cost center.

  1. when I try to create a cost center, the error message "Profit Center Accounting is enabled, but no profit center was specified." is outputted.
  2. when I try to create a profit center, any value of Standard Hierarchy Node doesn"t show up on a screen.
  3. when I try to create the node on Standard Hierarchy Node app, I can"t assign a profit center to the parent node, because the profit center is not created yet.

would you tell me how to create a cost center?

entry.title: Open Vendor Confirming Items in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I'm trying to migrate open vendor items that use the confirming payment method, including both the invoice and its payment. The payment includes a CME, and during the migration process, the system throws the following error:

"Special G/L indicator refers to special G/L type W. Special G/L transactions of type W are not supported in the interface to FI."

I would like to know if there is any solution or alternative, or what the correct procedure would be to handle this.

Thanks in advance and best regards.
